price: Au ndio wanasema: Sisi ni wengi tutashinda tu.
footnotes: Bali ati wanasema hawa makafiri: Sisi ni kikundi kilicho ungana chenye nguvu juu ya maadui wake, hakishindwi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
